title: Сверхъестественный отбор
overview: For the first time in the history of Russian television, the scandalous artist and artist Sergei Pakhomov, who himself has supernatural powers, will go on a tour of Russian cities to identify the most powerful psychics. According to the terms of the program, the best psychics in the city will come up with sophisticated tasks for each other, based on the opponents' vulnerabilities, and will evaluate how their colleagues cope with the challenges. Sergei Pakhomov, aka Pakhom, an extravagant showman, Internet star, underground actor, avant-garde musician, outrageous artist, screenwriter, "the root of good and evil", "metaphysical gnome" and "the foundation of the universe", "a man of the Renaissance in the middle of the Age of Degeneration", will monitor the tests and voting in the city.
